Class IfCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • mechanicalman.flowchart.program.Command
      • mechanicalman.flowchart.program.IfCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Command>

    public class IfCommand
extends Command
    Represents a command that does different things depending on the result.
    Author:
    Francesco Macagno

        public void setResult(Command c,
             boolean ifTrue)
        Sets the resulting command for if this if statement returns true or false.
        Parameters:
        c - Command to run when this is finished
        ifTrue - If the command should be run if the if returns true or false

      • getResult

        public Command getResult(boolean result)
        Gets the resulting command of this statement, either the true result or the false result depending on the passed parameter.
        Parameters:
        result - Whether to return the false-result of the true-result
        Returns:
        A command or null if a result hasn't been set
